rooms.description: Spacious living area with ample natural light from east facing windows, aligning with Vastu principles for energy flow. Features comfortable seating arrangements and modern decor.
Integrated dining space adjacent to the kitchen, designed with a harmonious layout for family gatherings and easy access from other functional spaces.
Fully equipped kitchen with island counter, integrated appliances. Placement is considered as per Vastu guidelines to promote efficient energy circulation within the home.
Primary bedroom located in a quiet corner of the ground floor for maximum comfort and privacy, featuring ample storage and a serene outlook. Vastu-aligned to ensure tranquility.
Additional bedroom designed for guest usage or family members, ensuring proper ventilation and access to natural light.
Functional bathroom with modern fixtures and good ventilation. Positioning is chosen based on Vastu norms to avoid water stagnation in the lower parts of the home.

openings.description: Main entrance designed for a welcoming entry point, aligning with Vastu principles ensuring a positive energy flow into the home.
Secondary access door located near the living area to facilitate ease of movement.

rooms.description: Upstairs bedroom designed for privacy, with a view that aligns with Vastu principles by facing south or east.
Additional bedroom ensuring sufficient space for family members while maintaining harmony in layout.

Dedicated library space fostering a quiet and inspirational environment, with shelves and seating arranged to encourage focus and relaxation. Vastu considerations ensure the placement enhances positive energy.
Personal gym area designed for fitness activities, equipped with space for exercise equipment and ensuring proper ventilation. Placement is considered to avoid disturbance to other living spaces.

openings.description: Staircase connecting ground floor and first floor, designed with ample width for safety and smooth movement.
Balcony located on the west-facing side of the plot, offering scenic views while ensuring adherence to local building norms and Vastu principles by balancing energy flow.
